data.title: Home Going Services Honoring The Life of Rodney Terrell Young Daniel & Son Funeral
data.text:
Home Going Services Honoring The Life of Rodney Terrell Young

Graveside Services

Saturday, April 3, 2021 @ 3:30 P.M.

Old Bethlehem Cemetery

Tunis , Texas

Pastor Gregg Jones , Officiant

Bryan Church Of Chris t

1701 We s t Hwy 21

Bryan, Texas 77808

Minister Willie Jackson Sr ., Eulogist

Obituary

Rodney Terrell Young, Sr. was born on May 12, 1972 to Frank Walker and Mary Florence

Elmore Young in Caldwell, Texas. He accepted Christ as his Lord and savior at an early age at

Dabney Hill Baptist Church. Rodney received his education in Bryan Independent School District, where he graduated from Bryan High School.

Rodney loved family gathering, football, enjoyed giving words of wisdom. Rodney departed this

life on Monday, March 29,2021 at Chi St. Joseph Regional Health Center, in Bryan, Texas.

Proceeding him in death his father Frank Walker; one brother ,Darryl Young,; one sister,

Rotanda Walker; grandparents, Sammie Elmore & Gladys Elmore.

Rodney’s memory will live on through the life of all his remaining family. Left to cherish his

memories are his mother, Mary Florence Young; seven children, Brittany Young, Terikka Young,

Ti’Ajanae Young, Rodney Young, Jr., Monrell Young, Ja’Keirah Young and Ta’Savion Young;

six siblings, Paula Baskin (Kenith), Tara Jackson (Willie), Crissunda Young (William), Ebony

Tates, Angelica Tates, and Becky Walker.

Special friends, Tony Young, Brad Howard, Steven Hargrove, and Lawrence Wallace, and host

of other relatives and friends.
